pullRequest.body:
This is based on noticing that the definition of `Matrix` imports `Algebra`.

* `Defs.lean` contains the definition of the `Matrix` type and its module structure
* `Mul.lean` contains vector-and-matrix multiplication operators
* `Basic.lean` still contains bundled versions of the operations defined above,
  and a few lemmas that didn't fit anywhere else.

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! 
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.
I think I'd argue that `diagonal` and `1` are really multiplicative ideas, and so belong in `Mul.lean` as well.
This no longer belongs in this file.

pullRequest.title: chore(Data/Matrix): split `Basic.lean` into `Defs.lean` and `Mul.lean`
